# Wide to Long Format

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

df <- read.csv("sample data/indicator_wide_format.csv")

long_df <- df %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("edu_"):starts_with("health_"),
               names_to = "indicator",
               values_to = "value")

head(long_df)
```
